TopicTitle: KSP Lurker finally getting to know the community

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I've been playing KSP since 2011 and lurking around building rockets and stuff.

It wasn't until the new spaceplane update that I decided to get to know the community.

So yeah uh, hi everyone.

My goal in KSP is to make a 100% re-usable no parts lost spaceplane that can make interplanetary travel and back.

So uh yeah, hi!

Hi Suzaku, and welcome to the KSP community forums

Good luck with your spaceplane designs, they are a lot of fun, especially landing them, I suggest you are a little careful with how you use the engines and fuel tanks, it's not in game yet but eventually the aircraft engines will only be able to use aircraft fuel tanks.

No way.. I finally did it... a SSTO that broke orbit of the Kerbin system! it's freaking interstellar!!!!

I just hope the design still works in 0.17
